title: Manage Investment Sale Marketing Campaign
description: An agent is hired to sell a $10 million shopping center and must create a marketing campaign to attract qualified buyers.

tasks.description: Create a professional Offering Memorandum (OM) with property details, financial analysis, and market information.
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive and persuasive OM is produced.

tasks.description: Develop a target list of potential buyers from the brokerage's internal database.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of 50-100 qualified investors is generated.

tasks.description: Launch an email marketing campaign to the target list with the OM and track engagement (opens, clicks).
tasks.expected_outcome: The email campaign is executed and its performance is monitored.
